summary: This document is a fax cover sheet from the Palm Beach Police Department to the FBI, along with a criminal information filing against Jeffrey E. Epstein for procuring a person under 18 for prostitution. It includes details about the charges and the involvement of the State Attorney's office in Palm Beach County.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is charged with procuring a person under the age of 18 for prostitution in the State of Florida.

persons.name: Barry E. Krischer
persons.context: Barry E. Krischer is the State Attorney for the Fifteenth Judicial Circuit, who is prosecuting the case against Epstein.

persons.name: Lanna Belohlavek
persons.context: Lanna Belohlavek is an Assistant State Attorney who has sworn to the allegations against Epstein.

connections.description: Barry E. Krischer is the State Attorney who oversees Lanna Belohlavek, the Assistant State Attorney working on the Epstein case.
Barry E. Krischer is prosecuting Jeffrey E. Epstein for the charges of procuring a minor for prostitution.
Lanna Belohlavek, as an Assistant State Attorney, is involved in the prosecution of Jeffrey E. Epstein.

events.title: Procuring Minor for Prostitution
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is charged with procuring a person under the age of 18 for prostitution between August 1, 2004, and October 9, 2005.

keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein is charged with procuring a person under 18 for prostitution.
The charges are based on events occurring between August 1, 2004, and October 9, 2005.
Barry E. Krischer is the State Attorney overseeing the prosecution.
Lanna Belohlavek is the Assistant State Attorney who has sworn to the allegations.
The document includes a fax cover sheet indicating communication between the Palm Beach Police Department and the FBI.
